events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting strong experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
After reviewing the applicant's resume, the recruiter categorized this application under the Engineering cluster due to the clear focus on software development skills.
A recruiter with expertise in technical hiring was assigned to guide the candidate through the recruitment process and arrange the necessary interviews.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call, confirming the candidate's strong technical background and enthusiasm for the engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to proceed with the technical interview, expressing eagerness to demonstrate their skills.
The technical interview was successfully scheduled for the candidate with an engineering manager to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
